==Install==

The setup does not longer than about 30 minutes and is not difficult even if you are not a computer expert. The setup describes a new installation. For update instructions see the [https://code.google.com/p/measureit/wiki/UpdateInstructions update page]

 * ....

Everyone is  welcome to describe your experience with your operating system or start developing a working version for other unix os or wathever system you use
